Package javax.microedition.apdu

This package defines the APDU protocol handler for ISO7816-4 communication to a smart card device.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
APDUConnection This interface defines the APDU (Application Protocol Data Unit) connection.
 

Package javax.microedition.apdu Description

This package defines the APDU protocol handler for ISO7816-4 communication to a smart card device.

Since:
SATSA1.0
